system_prompt: Translate the following motion by describing the motion of each bodypart. The available body parts include ['arms', 'legs', 'torso', 'neck','buttocks', 'waist']. The goal is to have a description of 70 tokens. If the motion is short, additionally use ['upper arm', 'lower arm', 'wrist', 'thigh', 'lower leg', 'chest', 'hip']
